statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content:
we define f(A) = 1, f(a) = -1, f(B) = 2, f(b) = -2, ... f(Z) = 26, f(z) = -26;
Give you a letter x and a number y , you should output the result of y+f(x).

statement.title: Input
statement.content: On the first line, contains a number T.then T lines follow, each line is a case.each case contains a letter and a number.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: for each case, you should the result of y+f(x) on a line.

statement.title: Sample Input
statement.content:
6
R 1
P 2
G 3
r 1
p 2
g 3
